title: Bargain basement
creator_credit: John Smith, James de B. Domville, Roman Kroitor and ONF | NFB
brief_description: This fictional film focuses on the unexpected confrontation of an experienced shoplifter and a lonely store detective. She lifts one time too many, and he suggests they “talk it over” - in his apartment! Desperation drives people into strange situations. When finally they part, neither one of them will ever be quite the same again. Original story by Douglas Bowie. Starring Vladimir Valenta and Luce Guilbeault. Awards: Toronto; Mannheim; New York.
